publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-555# Tricia Marwick: MS Standards of Care-That the Parliament welcomes the lobby of MSPs to take place on 19 November 2003 by MS Scotland and people affected with MS; recognises that in the last four years progress has been made in the provision of services to people with MS, but believes that the Scottish Executive should develop for people with MS a standard that will ensure that the level of treatment, support and care will be the same regardless of where in Scotland they live. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*

S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Jeremy Purvis*, Alex Neil*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Carolyn Leckie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Bruce Crawford*, Fergus Ewing*

S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Elaine Smith*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Brian Adam*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael McMahon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*

S2M-555# Tricia Marwick: MS Standards of Care-That the Parliament welcomes the lobby of MSPs to take place on 19 November 2003 by MS Scotland and people affected with MS; recognises that in the last four years progress has been made in the provision of services to people with MS, but believes that the Scottish Executive should develop for people with MS a standard that will ensure that the level of treatment, support and care will be the same regardless of where in Scotland they live. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Jeremy Purvis, Alex Neil, Murray Tosh, Mr Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Carolyn Leckie, Stewart Stevenson, Roseanna Cunningham, Bruce Crawford, Fergus Ewing, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Elaine Smith, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Michael McMahon, Dr Sylvia Jackson
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Fiona Hyslop*, Frances Curran*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) David Mundell*, Shona Robison*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-555# MS Standards of Care (lodged on 4 November 2003) Eleanor Scott*
